abstract: Emergent Game Technologies has secured $12 million in series D funding, The Triangle Business Journal reported Tuesday. The company makes video-game technology and will use the new cash to consolidate its northern California office into its existing research and development facility in Chapel Hill, N.C.
lead_paragraph: Emergent Game Technologies has secured $12 million in series D funding, The Triangle Business Journal reported Tuesday. The company makes video-game technology and will use the new cash to consolidate its northern California office into its existing research and development facility in Chapel Hill, N.C.
